title: Quiz 1: Mendel's Law of Inheritance
description: Test your ability to predict genotypes and phenotypes of parents and offsprings using the laws of inheritance.

items.question: This is law states that some alleles are dominant while others are recessive; an organism with at least one dominant allele will display the effect of the dominant allele.
This is the law which states that during gamete formation, the alleles for each gene segregate from each other so that each gamete carries only one allele for each gene.
This law states that genes of different traits can segregate independently during the formation of gametes.
